description: Request consent for the following proposed works as part of an on going tree maintenance schedule to trees in communal areas as owned by London & Quadrant housing association:09VY Group of 5 mixed broadleaf species consisting primarily of Sycamore: Lift crown to 3m from ground level and prune lateral branches on West canopy aspect by up to and no more than 2m (reducing the West canopy spread from 6m to 4m) to appropriate pruning points to provide clearance to street lamp and allow clear light dispersal to the pavement below.09VZ & 09W0 Alder x2: Crown lift to 3m from ground level to provide clearance for cars and pedestrians.09W3 & 09W6 Lime x2: Prune lateral branches on East canopy aspects by no more than 1.5m (reducing East canopy spreads from 6m to 4.5m) to appropriate pruning points to clear from buildings and allow better light penetration to properties and footpath. Crown lift to 3.5m from ground level for pedestrians and light dispersal.
